snippet: The private equity firm GCS Capital of Hong Kong is in discussions to acquire the fund management unit of the struggling European bank Dexia. A price for the division was not disclosed.
abstract: The private equity firm GCS Capital of Hong Kong is in discussions to acquire the fund management unit of the struggling European bank Dexia. A price for the division was not disclosed.
lead_paragraph: The private equity firm GCS Capital of Hong Kong is in discussions to acquire the fund management unit of the struggling European bank Dexia, which has received several government bailouts as a result of the financial crisis. A price for the Dexia division was not disclosed, though analysts said it could be worth around $650 million. Read more »

headline.main: GCS Capital in Talks to Buy Dexia Asset Management
